entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Overcast. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
